name: Untitled 7DFPS project (Vector doomclone)
description:
WARNING! This project is *completely* unfinished, and I am only uploading it in it's current state for the jam submission.
It currently only supports mouse+keyboard, so mobile will be less than optimal.
Try at your own risk, I will be updating this page over the week.

Current Controls:
ESDF - Movement
Mouse/Arrow keys - Look
Left mouse button/X: shoot
Z/Space: Jump
